meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: House Backs Stem Cell Work The House gave final Congressional approval to legislation aimed at easing restrictions on federal financing of embryonic stem cell research, but Democratic leaders conceded they lacked the votes to override a threatened veto.
Varying Academic Standards The Department of Education issued a report that, for the first time, measured the wide extent of differences in academic standards among the states.
Inquiry Linked to a Senator In a corruption inquiry, questions have arisen about the ties of Senator Ted Stevens, Republican of Alaska, to a former oil executive and about renovations to his home.
Spurs Jump Ahead in Finals San Antonio held LeBron James to 14 points and beat the Cleveland Cavaliers, 85-76, in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals.

House Backs Stem Cell Work The House gave final Congressional approval to legislation aimed at easing restrictions on federal financing of embryonic stem cell research, but Democratic leaders conceded they lacked the votes to override a threatened veto.
Varying Academic Standards The Department of Education issued a report that, for the first time, measured the wide extent of differences in academic standards among the states.
Inquiry Linked to a Senator In a corruption inquiry, questions have arisen about the ties of Senator Ted Stevens, Republican of Alaska, to a former oil executive and about renovations to his home.
Spurs Jump Ahead in Finals San Antonio held LeBron James to 14 points and beat the Cleveland Cavaliers, 85-76, in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals.
